mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hewes, David T. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hewes, David T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Ex. FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 13 1861. By Telegraph, from Clarksburg, 15 1860. Capt Hall of my regt will visit you today for the purpose of trying to get out he is the man that raised all the difficulty if you let him out it breaks my regiment for Gods sake hold him & reply him to me I have issued an order for an election on Saturday next. D.L. Hewes [David T. Hewes] Col 3rd Regt 22 cmdg 511D173pd [page 2] Col Hewes Clarksburg July 15
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hewes, David T.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
